thread.title: Jack Bastide
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Jack Bastide

author: Jack Bastide
title: Jack Bastide
text:
Ok so I got the Pelican System Installed about 2 Weeks Ago.
Install went very smoothly. Everything good so far.
My Tap Water doesn't have the Chlorine Smell. I tested it with a Pool Water tester and there is No Chlorine Anymore. I also tested the PH and it is Alkaline and Not Acidic which is important. I believe that my tap water is now better than the Bottled water we were buying
